name: Geometroids
description:
An asteroids-like game with physically based shapes! Blast your way to your next high score, and see how high of a level you can make it to! Addicting and action-packed.

HOW TO PLAY & FAQ

-NOTE: Difficulty increases every few seconds.

-NOTE: Every 2,500 points, you earn a new life.

-NOTE: 150 is max difficulty.

-CONTROLS: WASD/Arrow keys/controller triggers for movement, space key/left click/controller a button (XBOX) for shooting, esc/xbox start for pause.

You can save your scores if you choose to do so, and review them at any time.
